name: Dogyuun
storyline: Transmission with a police communication headquarters at the planet Dino has been ceased for an unknown reason. Three experienced pilots were sent out to investigate the issue, however all of a sudden one of them known by the name of Kyle is killed by a mysterious alien race. The remaining two pilots decide to avenge their killed friend and wipe out the aliens.
summary: It is a science-fiction top down shooter in which the player controls bomber space fighter crafts called Sylfers. The player is provided with a main weapon - a laser beam which can be upgraded to a lightning beam. There are two slots for additional upgrades that can be attached to the ship. The first one is for a bomb module and the second one is for a speed module.
